channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: A comprehensive resource covering Smart Home Tech, detailed Single Board Computers (SBC) reviews, mini PC, Home Automation, HomeLab upgrades, and Home Assistant guides.

item.title: How I Setup ESP32 Cam with Frigate And Home Assistant To Detect Objects — Step-By-Step Guide
item.description: In this article, we will be looking at how we configure Frigate to detect object and then connect it to Home Assistant to receive notification.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: How To Setup Local Tuya With Home Assistant
item.description: In this article, we will be looking at how we control Tuya Devices Locally using Local Tuya.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
